verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab כִּ֠י <WH3588> Surely בְּלֵ֞יל <WH3915> Because in the night שֻׁדַּ֨ד <WH7703> is laid waste עָ֤ר <WH6144> Ar מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab נִדְמָ֔ה <WH1820> [and] brought to silence כִּ֗י <WH3588> Surely בְּלֵ֛יל <WH3915> because in the night שֻׁדַּ֥ד <WH7703> is laid waste קִיר־ <WH7024> Kir מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab נִדְמָֽה׃ <WH1820> [and] brought to silence

עָלָ֨ה <WH5927> He is gone up הַבַּ֧יִת <WH1004> to the temple וְדִיבֹ֛ן <WH1769> and to Dibon הַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> the high places לְבֶ֑כִי <WH1065> to weep עַל־ <WH5921> over נְב֞וֹ <WH5015> over Nebo וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> over מֵֽידְבָא֙ <WH4311> and over Medeba מוֹאָ֣ב <WH4124> Moab יְיֵלִ֔יל <WH3213> shall howl בְּכָל־ <WH3605> Everyone's רֹאשָׁ֣יו <WH7218> on all their heads קָרְחָ֔ה <WH7144> [shall be] baldness כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָקָ֖ן <WH2206> [and] every beard גְּרוּעָֽה׃ <WH1639> is cut

בְּחוּצֹתָ֖יו <WH2351> In their streets חָ֣גְרוּ <WH2296> they shall gird שָׂ֑ק <WH8242> themselves with sackcloth עַ֣ל <WH5921> on גַּגּוֹתֶ֧יהָ <WH1406> on the tops וּבִרְחֹבֹתֶ֛יהָ <WH7339> of their houses and in their streets כֻּלֹּ֥ה <WH3605> Everyone יְיֵלִ֖יל <WH3213> every one shall howl יֹרֵ֥ד <WH3381> abundantly בַּבֶּֽכִי׃ <WH1065> weeping

וַתִּזְעַ֤ק <WH2199> shall cry חֶשְׁבּוֹן֙ <WH2809> And Heshbon וְאֶלְעָלֵ֔ה <WH500> and Elealeh עַד־ <WH5704> all יַ֖הַץ <WH3096> [even] unto Jahaz נִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> shall be heard קוֹלָ֑ם <WH6963> their voice עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that חֲלֻצֵ֤י <WH2502> therefore the armed soldiers מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab יָרִ֔יעוּ <WH7321> shall cry out נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> his life יָ֥רְעָה <WH3415> shall be grievous לּֽוֹ׃

לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> My heart לְמוֹאָ֣ב <WH4124> for Moab יִזְעָ֔ק <WH2199> shall cry out בְּרִיחֶ֕הָ <WH1280> his fugitives עַד־ <WH5704> far צֹ֖עַר <WH6820> [shall flee] unto Zoar עֶגְלַ֣ת <WH5697> an heifer שְׁלִשִׁיָּ֑ה <WH7992> of three years old כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> Surely מַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> for by the mounting up הַלּוּחִ֗ית <WH3872> of Luhith בִּבְכִי֙ <WH1065> with weeping יַֽעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> shall they go it up בּ֔וֹ כִּ֚י <WH3588> Surely דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> for in the way חוֹרֹנַ֔יִם <WH2773> of Horonaim זַעֲקַת־ <WH2201> a cry שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> of destruction יְעֹעֵֽרוּ׃ <WH5782> they shall raise up

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely מֵ֥י <WH4325> For the waters נִמְרִ֖ים <WH5249> of Nimrim מְשַׁמּ֣וֹת <WH4923> shall be desolate יִֽהְי֑וּ <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely יָבֵ֤שׁ <WH3001> is withered away חָצִיר֙ <WH2682> for the hay כָּ֣לָה <WH3615> faileth דֶ֔שֶׁא <WH1877> the grass יֶ֖רֶק <WH3418> there is no green thing לֹ֥א <WH3808> is no הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> become

עַל־ <WH5921> over כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that יִתְרָ֣ה <WH3502> Therefore the abundance עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> they have gotten וּפְקֻדָּתָ֔ם <WH6486> and that which they have laid up עַ֛ל <WH5921> over נַ֥חַל <WH5158> to the brook הָעֲרָבִ֖ים <WH6155> of the willows יִשָּׂאֽוּם׃ <WH5375> shall they carry away

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִקִּ֥יפָה <WH5362> is gone round about הַזְּעָקָ֖ה <WH2201> For the cry אֶת־ <WH853> גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> the borders מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab עַד־ <WH5704> far אֶגְלַ֙יִם֙ <WH97> thereof unto Eglaim יִלְלָתָ֔הּ <WH3215> the howling וּבְאֵ֥ר אֵילִ֖ים <WH879> thereof unto Beerelim יִלְלָתָֽהּ׃ <WH3215> and the howling

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely מֵ֤י <WH4325> For the waters דִימוֹן֙ <WH1775> of Dimon מָ֣לְאוּ <WH4390> shall be full דָ֔ם <WH1818> of blood כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely אָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> for I will bring עַל־ <WH5921> upon דִּימ֖וֹן <WH1775> upon Dimon נוֹסָפ֑וֹת <WH3254> more לִפְלֵיטַ֤ת <WH6413> upon him that escapeth מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> lions וְלִשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> and upon the remnant אֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the land
